definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. estimate, fig.: ´[[וְתׂכֵן רוּחוֹת י]]: Pr 16:2, so ([[לִבּוֹת]]) Pr 21:2, Pr 24:12.

definitions.title: Niph. 1.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[נִתְכְּנוּ עֲלִלוֹת]] [[[לוֹ]]] [[וְלאׁ]] 1Sa 2:3 by him (´[[י]]:) are actions estimated

Impf., be adjusted to the standard, i.e. right, equitable: subj. [[דֶרֶח]] (of ´[[י]]: and of Israel), 3 ms. [[יִתָּכֵן]] Ez Eze 18:25, Eze 18:25, Eze 18:29, Eze 18:29, Eze 33:17, Eze 33:17, Eze 33:20; 3 mpl. [[יִתָּֽכְנוּ]] Eze 18:29, [[יִתָּכֵָנוּ]] v:Eze 18:25.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ; read poss. [[הֵבִין]] or [[הֵכִין]]); 1 s. [[תִּכַּ֫נְתִּי עַמּוּדֶיהָ]] Ps 75:4 I regulate (or adjust) her pillars (i.e. of earth).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[הַכֶּסֶף הַמְּתֻכָּן]] 2Ki 12:12 the silver which was measured out.
